short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take screenshots and report issues to PWTech

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will be used by our clients to easily report issues on their sites. It will automatically generate a task to be worked on by our team, with detail included from the webpage currently being viewed.
